description: This file contains unit tests for the React application component App, focusing on UI rendering, validation, mock weather search functionality, and audit log recording.

methods.name: renders search input and button
methods.description: Tests if the search input and button are rendered in the App component.

methods.name: shows validation error for empty input
methods.description: Checks that validation error appears when attempting to search with empty input.

methods.name: performs a search and displays weather card (mock mode)
methods.description: Simulates entering a city name and verifies the weather weather card appears with correct city name.

methods.name: audit log records actions
methods.description: Tests that actions are logged in the audit log, including UI updates and presence of log entries.
